snippet.title: The Last Faith - Beta Now Live
snippet.description:
Play the beta now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1274600/The_Last_Faith/

The dark fusion of metroidvaina and soulslike. The wicked and the blessed will be judged the same; let nothing stand in your way.

Coming this October to PC, Nintendo Switch, PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One
